item.description:
Enjoy another fun night of dining with great people!

Thursdays at the 1790 is Ten Bucks Burger & Beer Night!

Join us at the lounge for a half-pound Omaha Burger with lettuce, tomato & fries and your favorite draft (or house wine) for $10 bucks! on draft- Sam Adams Lager; Harpoon IPA; Sherwood Forest Archer's Ale; Budweiser Light Golden Wheat.

If you can't get there by 6 pm, that's okay, we'll save you a seat.

To make the paying situation go smoothly, please bring cash.

If you do not want a burger, there will be a couple of other options for you (i.e. chicken sandwich, salad). Also, if you do not like beer you can have wine instead.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the meetup group or Jacki's party.
item.name: Ten Bucks Burger & Beer
